summary.name: Bridgestone Truck Tire Commodity Chain
summary.description: This is a map representing the global production locations of the Bridgestone truck tire, illustrating the geographies of the different stages and processes involved.

overview.name: Bridgestone Corporate Headquarters
overview.description: This is the main headquarters for the Bridgestone Group. The CEO Masaaki Tsuya and his management team do their business from here.

overview.name: Carbon Black Plant
overview.description: This is the first carbon black plant that Bridgestone operates. Carbon black is a key ingredient in the production of truck tires.

overview.name: Carbon Black Plant
overview.description: A second carbon black plant operated by Bridgestone. This plant is the Asahi Carbon Co. Ltd. and is a major subsidiary of Bridgestone.

overview.name: Carbon Black Plant
overview.description: This is the third carbon black plant that Bridgestone operates. It employs roughly 100 people of Mexico, and is the location used to supply the North American tire manufacturing plants.

overview.name: Steel Cord Plant
overview.description: One of Bridgestones Iron (Steel Cord) plants. Readily available ingredient which supplies North American plants.

location.address: North Tennessee Bible Institute and Seminary, 3061 Hwy 41a S, Clarksville, TN 37043, USA

overview.name: Steel Cord Plant
overview.description: Second Steel Cord Plan operated by Bridgestone.

overview.name: Steel Cord Plant
overview.description: A fourth Steel Cord Plant operated by Bridgestone.

overview.name: Steel Cord Plant
overview.description: A fifth Steel Cord plant operated by Bridgestone.

overview.name: Steel Cord Plant
overview.description: A sixth Steel Cord Plant operated by Bridgestone.

overview.name: Steel Cord Plant
overview.description: A seventh steel cord plant operated by Bridgestone.

overview.name: Steel Cord Plant(s)
overview.description: The location of two Steel Cord plants in North Carolina, United States.

overview.name: Chemical Supplies
overview.description: This is where Marathwada Chemicals is located, which I have assumed is the type of organization in which Bridgestone acquires some of the chemicals needed to produce tires. These chemicals include zinc stearate, wax, accelerators, and antioxidants and antiozonants.

overview.name: Synthetic Rubber Plant
overview.description: This is the first synthetic rubber plant operated by Bridgestone. It is the first of two plants within the United States.

location.address: North Tennessee Bible Institute and Seminary, 3061 Hwy 41a S, Clarksville, TN 37043, USA

overview.name: Synthetic Rubber Plant
overview.description: This is the second synthetic rubber plant in the USA that Bridgestone operates.

overview.name: Synthetic Rubber Plant
overview.description: A third synthetic rubber plant operated by Bridgestone.

overview.name: Natural Rubber Plant
overview.description: The first natural rubber plant that Bridgestone operates throughout the world.

overview.name: Natural Rubber Plant
overview.description: A second natural rubber plant located in Indonesia, operated by Bridgestone.

overview.name: Natural Rubber Plant
overview.description: Third natural rubber plant operated by Bridgestone.

overview.name: Natural Rubber Plant
overview.description: This is the final natural rubber plant operated by Bridgestone, under the company Firestone Natural Rubber Company. This location is the community I have focused on in my paper.

overview.name: Tire Manufacturing Plants
overview.description: There are ten tire manufacturing plants in Japan, all operated by Bridgestone.

overview.name: Tire Manufacturing Plants
overview.description: There are five tire manufacturing plants in Thailand, all operated by Bridgestone.

overview.name: Tire Manufacturing Plants
overview.description: There are two tire manufacturing plants in Indonesia, both belonging to Bridgestone.

overview.name: Tire Manufacturing Plant
overview.description: Tire manufacturing plant operated by Bridgestone.

overview.name: Tire Manufacturing Plant
overview.description: Tire manufacturing plant operated by Bridgestone.

overview.name: Tire Manufacturing Plants

overview.name: Tire Retreading Plant
overview.description: A tire retreading plant operated by Bridgestone.

overview.name: Tire Manufacturing Plant
overview.description: Tire manufacturing plant operated by Bridgestone.

overview.name: Tire Manufacturing Plants
overview.description: Two tire manufacturing plants operated by Bridgestone.

overview.name: Tire Manufacturing Plants
overview.description: Eleven tire manufacturing plants operated by Bridgestone.

overview.name: Tire Manufacturing Plants
overview.description: Three tire manufacturing plants in Mexico, operated by Bridgestone.

overview.name: North American Tire Manufacturing Plants
overview.description: Fifteen tire manufacturing plants throughout North America operated by Bridgestone.
